response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which I believe will greatly benefit and enhance your endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am offering it to you at an introductory price of $950,000. This represents a significant saving compared to the market value of $1,000,000, and I am confident it will be a wise investment for you. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details about the product. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
